name: flights_list_in_boundary
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool flight_radar.
Tool description: The world's most popular flight tracker API which helps you to create Flight tracker application, such as : flightradar24.com
API description: Fetches a list of flights within a specified geographical bounding box and returns flight information based on various optional filters.

bl_lng.description: The bottom left longitude of the bounding box.

tr_lat.description: The top right latitude of the bounding box.

bl_lat.description: The bottom left latitude of the bounding box.

tr_lng.description: The top right longitude of the bounding box.

type.description: Filter by the value of the 'Code' field returned in the aircrafts/list endpoint.

speed.description: Filter by speed. The format is min,max (e.g., "0,460").

airline.description: Filter by the value of the 'ICAO' field returned in the airlines/list endpoint.

altitude.description: Filter by altitude. The format is min,max (e.g., "0,48000").

airport.description: The value of 'icao' field returned in .../airports/list endpoint

limit.description: The maximum number of flights per response (default is 300; max is 300).
